com.adidas.connectcore.token

Class AndroidTokenRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.connectcore.token.AndroidTokenRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenRepository

    public class AndroidTokenRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenRepository
    This class will be used for storing, obtaining and removing Token for a User. As this is the android implementation it uses the AccountManager inside to manage the tokens.
